name: quaternity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a group of four things or people: As a quaternity, the four streams remind us of the four rivers of Eden. These four characters form the quaternity, three males plus a female fourth.
More examplesFewer examplesBecause audiences had a strong feeling for quaternities, two marriages, uniting four people, was a conclusion that they found satisfying.He describes four stages of development, but his treatment of this quaternity in his writing was quite brief.
